body:
The Two-Way 
             It's Official: Hillary Clinton Announces Presidential Run
         
         

      
      

   
   

   Hillary Clinton will hold her first campaign events in Iowa Tuesday since announcing her 2016 bid for the White House. What can we expect to see? Her aides say to think small.
description: Hillary Clinton will hold her first campaign events in Iowa Tuesday since announcing her 2016 bid for the White House. What can we expect to see? Her aides say to think small.
title: After Low-Key Announcement, Hillary Clinton Heads To Iowa
